entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
